item.title: These are the new jobs AI will create
item.description: It is a fact that AI will replace some jobs. But, according to the World Economic Forum, AI will also create 97 million new jobs by 2025. What kind of jobs are they exactly?
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, AI, artificial intelligence, job automation, future of work, workforce transformation, skills development, labor market trends, digital transformation, emerging technologies, talent management, job growth
item.media:title: These are the new jobs AI will create
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,AI, artificial intelligence, job automation, future of work, workforce transformation, skills development, labor market trends, digital transformation, emerging technologies, talent management, job growth

item.title: Old-fashioned ski resort struggles with climate change
item.description: Anton Kalberer has been running a small, family-owned ski resort on Sarn-Heinzenberg in the Grisons for over half a century. The family has always tried to keep it sustainable. Now, climate change is posing a new challenge.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, mountains, ski resort, sustainability, climate change, environmental impact, winter sports, adaptation strategies, Switzerland
item.media:title: Old-fashioned ski resort struggles with climate change
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,mountains, ski resort, sustainability, climate change, environmental impact, winter sports, adaptation strategies, Switzerland

item.title: Italy’s shipwreck victims
item.description: More than 80 migrants drowned off the Italian coast when their boat was wrecked. Hasib is a survivor. Vincenzo was a rescuer. Both are traumatized from the tragedy.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, migrants, Italian coast, tragedy, drowning, survivor, rescuer, trauma, humanitarian crisis, immigration, mediterranean sea, Italy
item.media:title: Italy’s shipwreck victims
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,migrants, Italian coast, tragedy, drowning, survivor, rescuer, trauma, humanitarian crisis, immigration, mediterranean sea, Italy

item.title: Desexualizing the breasts
item.description: Lotte Mies is a gender equality activist from Berlin. She won a legal battle to allow women to be topless in the city’s public pools as of March 9. What do you think about this?

item.media:title: Desexualizing the breasts

item.title: Putin’s doppelganger supports Ukraine
item.description: Sławomir Sobala’s outward similarity to Vladimir Putin made him a much sought-after impersonator of the Russian president. But after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine he stopped playing in comedies and commercials. He is now looking for more critical productions.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Putin, Russia, impersonator, actor, comedy, entertainment
item.media:title: Putin’s doppelganger supports Ukraine
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Putin, Russia, impersonator, actor, comedy, entertainment
